properties.Name: ProductCategory
properties.Description:
A means of categorizing retail products by functions performed, characteristics or similar common characteristics.

Ex:

- Baby
- Beer, Wine & Spirits
- Beverages
- Bread & Bakery
- Breakfast & Cereal
- Canned Goods & Soups
- Clothing & Apparel
- Condiments / Spices & Bake
- Cookies, Snacks & Candy
- Dairy, Eggs & Cheese
- Deli & Signature Cafe
- Frozen Foods
- Fruits & Vegetables
- Grains, Pasta & Sides
- International Cuisine
- Meat & Seafood
- Paper, Cleaning & Home
- Personal Care & Pharmacy
- Pet Care
- Tobacco

Columns.Name: ProductCategoryId
Columns.Description: The unique identifier of a Product Category.

Columns.Name: ProductCategoryName
Columns.Description: The name of a Product Category.

Columns.Name: ProductCategoryDescription
Columns.Description: The description of a Product Category.
